title: When to make Dua at end of prayer (dua masura) before or after durood / salutations? Assim al hakeem
transcript: says when do we do the dua do we do the dua before the dua mashura as he says and i presume that he's meaning to say do we say it before or afterwards of course we know we have to make the dua after the salutation it doesn't make any difference so if you make the salutation and then you say and then you say allah then you offer salam no problem if you reverse that no problem at all be india so
